name: Duality (itch) (SamBread)
description:
This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2022, which had the theme Duality.

It's basically a top down hack and slash game and you can use the dark and white affinity to attack the enemies. 

  Story

Elana, you must save those souls and send them back to slumber. They are trapped between life and death, bright and dark. They are in severe agony and rage. They will confront you as any lost and confused soul will but you, Elana, one of the guardian Elves of this realm must send them back to slumber.

Controls 

  • Movement: WASD 
  • Attack: 
  • Left Mouse Button 
  • Space: Jump

Sound Effects & Music
